Smiling as fruit of his efforts now stood before him. A tall and beutiful =
thing, a worthy follower and companion. He watched as she tested her weapon=
ry, becoming familiar now with his new body. Now they were a force to be re=
ckoned with. 
=A0
"We return, but to a precarious world. WHat we do here wi=
ll last to the future, our pasts. We must preserve this little world, or ev=
erything will be gone. The descendants of the Decepticns and the Autobots q=
uarrel mindlessly, make changes to this world for their own gain. For the D=
ecepticon EMpire to have a future, we must make safe it's past. But we must=
 not be hasty, we should use these fools for all they are worth before putt=
ing an end to them."

--- On Thu, 10/29/09, Lady B <MaximaSR74@...> wro=
te:


From: Lady B <MaximaSR74@...>
Subject: A new body
To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com
Date: Thursday, October 29, 2009, 5:39 PM


=A0 



>
> 
> Cont=
inuing to guide the construction of the new body, Megatron X smirked with s=
atisfaction at the sound of the female's voice. "Soon, very soon, you shall=
 stand tall before me. A body, fit and pure, made for your warrior spark." =
It would seem like mere moments later that the work was completed. The work=
 station slid aside, then the wall seperating the two Decepticons slid the =
opposite way. Megatron X stepped forward to grasp the framework Holding Max=
ima in place, pulling it forward to allow her to take her first step into t=
he lab.
> =A0
> The frame began to fall away, leaving her to stand on her o=
wn two feet before him.
> 
> 

Crimson optics flashed brightly then remaine=
d a continuous glow like burning embers. 
Moments following, her legs moved=
 to take her first step in this new body. What seemed wobbly at first now b=
ecame strong without a doubt. First step landed with a heavy metallic thunk=
 upon the floor. Followed by another as her other leg came up alongside. 

=
Standing tall before Megatron X, a form ever so worthy of the old Deceptico=
n. A tall, stout, and menacing form, albeit a femme, she wasn't the type to=
 be fragile. Her fingers flexed as she glanced down at them. Not long with =
claws as she use to have but that could be remedied. 
So.. now, she accesse=
d her weapons. 
With a whir and hum, chunk and tink... her weapons formed a=
nd transformed from her arms and shoulders, even one cannon that flipped do=
wn from her back to poke out from beside her waist. 

"Impressive, " she ch=
imed in with that sultry malicious deep femme voice. Her tone reflected how=
 pleased she was with this new form. And good ridence to the techno-organic=
 form. No self-respecting Cybertronian would be techno-organic. She'll leav=
e that to the horrifying experiments conducted by the Quintessons. 

Those =
crimson optics returned to Megatron X, looking at him, as a smile curled up=
on her metallic lips. "The Decepticons. .. return." Her optics flashed brig=
htly once more.
